## assertNotXPath() function

Assert that there is currently no element matching the XPath on the page.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function assertNotXPath(page: Page, xpath: string, options: AssertNotXPathOptions, _timeout?: number, _checkEvery?: number): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  page | Page | puppeteer page object. |
|  xpath | string | XPath to search for. |
|  options | [AssertNotXPathOptions](./pentf.assertnotxpathoptions.md) |  |
|  \_timeout | number |  |
|  \_checkEvery | number |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
